marklogic.body:
I don't think we go bigger than 5 gallons, though I'm horrible at judging volume and I can't remember for sure. We Always do it outside because my mom doesn't want it to stink up the house. It doesn't hurt that the little outdoor burner my dad has Heats up water much quicker than a conventional stove, either.
I'd be kinda surprised if Blizzard incorporated real brewing terms; at least I haven't seen anything to that effect yet. Though there is a brewery instance, right? Maybe we'll fight wort monsters there!
